name: Where is Betty
description:
Game made in 48 Hours for the GLOBAL GAME JAM 2021 (Lost and Found).

You are a mysterious detective looking for Betty...You will explore the night city looking for clues via speaking to npc's. When in doubt follow the cats! There are still a few things that need work, updates should follow along in due time.

2D | Top-Down | Tilebased Movement.

Movement: WASD | Arrows

Interact: Enter

Next Text bubble: N

Previous Text bubble: P
